about_the_game:
The official Deep Space soundtrack by HateBit.
(6 tracks MP3 and WAV)
========================================

1. HateBit - Deep Space OST - Deep Space
2. HateBit - Deep Space OST - Space vice
3. HateBit - Deep Space OST - Reaction
4. HateBit - Deep Space OST - LaZZers and BlaZZers
5. HateBit - Deep Space OST - B and S
6. HateBit - Deep Space OST - All aliens are hobos

========================================
After download you can find files in ..\Steam\steamapps\common\DEEP_SPACE\deep_ost
detailed_description:
The official Deep Space soundtrack by HateBit.
(6 tracks MP3 and WAV)
========================================

1. HateBit - Deep Space OST - Deep Space
2. HateBit - Deep Space OST - Space vice
3. HateBit - Deep Space OST - Reaction
4. HateBit - Deep Space OST - LaZZers and BlaZZers
5. HateBit - Deep Space OST - B and S
6. HateBit - Deep Space OST - All aliens are hobos

========================================
After download you can find files in ..\Steam\steamapps\common\DEEP_SPACE\deep_ost
name: Deep Space - Official OST

  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
